thread.title: FCA drops three-year probe into 'London Whale'
thread.title_full: FCA drops three-year probe into 'London Whale'

author: Andrew Trotman
title: FCA drops three-year probe into 'London Whale'
text: Banks and Finance FCA drops three-year probe into 'London Whale' It is believed the Uk regulator had not built a strong enough case against Bruno Iksil, whose trades lost $6.2bn for JP Morgan Bruno Iksil oversaw huge trades while working at JP Morgan's chief investment office in London Photo: Getty
